english.segment1: Mercy is falling, is falling, is falling. Mercy it falls like the sweet spring rain. Mercy is falling, is falling all over me. (repeat verse)
english.segment2: CHORUS. Hey, oh, I receive Your mercy. Hey, oh, I receive Your grace. Hey, oh, I will dance forevermore.
english.segment4: CHORUS. Hey, oh, I receive Your mercy. Hey, oh, I receive Your grace. Hey, oh, I will dance forevermore.
english.segment6: BRIDGE. Hey, oh, I receive Your mercy. Hey, oh, I receive Your grace. (repeat bridge)
english.segment7: CHORUS. Hey, oh, I receive Your mercy. Hey, oh, I receive Your grace. Hey, oh, I will dance forevermore. Hey, oh, I receive Your mercy. Hey, oh, I receive Your grace. Hey, oh, I will dance forevermore, 'cause I will dance forevermore.
